name: UPS (Underground Postal Service)
description:
The game is majority functional, but I didn't have enough time to fully complete the game, but I had fun learning about destructible tile maps :D

This is a game about delivering packages underground! You are a miner and mine around to the various mailboxes and deliver the package. I wanted to add traps and stuff but didn't have the time. I was mostly messing around with a breakable tile map so I'm sorry there isn't much of a game! (There are a couple bugs since I overestimated the time it would take to make this game)

Resources Used:

Game Engine: Unity

Art:

Piskel - Free online sprite editor (piskelapp.com)

Controls:

S - Move to the left

D - Move to the right

Space - Jump

Mouse Click - Mine Block

How to Play:

- Grab the package

- Deliver package to one of the various mailboxes

- Once package is delivered mailbox will close and the package will respawn!
